code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function CreateArea(props){const[note,setNote]=useState({title:"",content:""});function handleChange(e){const{name,value}=e.target;setNote(prevValues=>{return{...prevValues,[name]:value};});}function submitForm(e){props.onAdd(note);setNote({title:"",content:""});e.preventDefault();}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{onChange:handleChange,name:"title",placeholder:"Title",value:note.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{onChange:handleChange,name:"content",placeholder:"Take a note...",rows:"3",value:note.content}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:submitForm,children:"Add"})]})});}export default CreateArea;
